discoverText: Your profile page tells people the story of your work through the repositories you’re interested in, the contributions you’ve made, and the conversations you’ve had.
filtersText: To filter detailed information about a user on GitHub, you can classify and sort your results in ways that are relevant to you.
reposText: A repository contains all of your project’s files and each file’s revision history. You can discuss and manage your project’s work within the repository.
emptyInternetText: Your internet connection is down. Please fix it and then you can continue using Github App!
